name: Cyclodrama
description:
IMPORTANT: You need to play this game on a 64-bit Windows.

This a little part of a full game, Cyclodrama, a graphic adventure that takes some ideas of the classics of the genre, it modernize them in a different way that the one followed by the original trajectory of the genre, and also picks modern graphic adventure features up.

The plot takes place in a theater and, onstage, there is another theater, a deconstructed theater, where each room is represented with a scenery, a set. The characters are enclosed in that world, living a story that loops infinitely, and it always has a bad result.

That story begins with awful news: the owner of the theater has passed away and that means the imminent closure of the business. The main character, Óliver, an young boy that loves that world, is visited by the ghost of the owner, and he told Óliver he must find the secret treasure of the theater, hidden somewhere in the core of the building. For achieving that, Óliver must find some gears that will give him access to a door, behind which lies the treasure.

While he is busy looking for that treasure, he still have to do his job, which is to be the errand boy, so his tasks are so varied. In this demo, he will have to help Belinda in the preparation of a costume for Notan Actor. This takes place in the first scene of the second act, when it's also introduced León, the new event coordinator of the theater, and he's a bit strange.
